computer_parts.name: Intel Core i9-13900K Processor
computer_parts.description: A high-performance 13th-gen processor with 24 cores and 32 threads, delivering exceptional speed for gaming and content creation.

computer_parts.name: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D Processor
computer_parts.description: A cutting-edge processor with 8 cores and 16 threads, designed for unparalleled gaming and multi-tasking efficiency.

computer_parts.name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Graphics Card
computer_parts.description: The ultimate GPU for gaming and creative work, offering stunning ray tracing, DLSS 3.0 support, and 24GB of GDDR6X memory.

computer_parts.name: ASUS ROG STRIX X670E Motherboard
computer_parts.description: A premium motherboard for AMD Ryzen processors, featuring PCIe 5.0, Wi-Fi 6E, and robust overclocking support.

computer_parts.name: Corsair Vengeance RGB PRO 32GB DDR5 RAM
computer_parts.description: High-performance RGB memory with 32GB capacity and speeds of up to 6000MHz, perfect for gaming and heavy workloads.

computer_parts.name: Samsung 980 PRO 2TB NVMe SSD
computer_parts.description: A lightning-fast storage solution with PCIe 4.0 technology, offering read speeds of up to 7,000 MB/s for demanding applications.

computer_parts.name: Seagate BarraCuda 4TB Hard Drive
computer_parts.description: A reliable and spacious HDD ideal for storing games, movies, and other large files, with a speed of 7200 RPM.

computer_parts.name: EVGA 850W SuperNOVA Power Supply
computer_parts.description: A fully modular 80+ Gold certified PSU, delivering clean and efficient power to your PC while reducing cable clutter.

computer_parts.name: NZXT H7 Elite Mid-Tower Case
computer_parts.description: A sleek and spacious mid-tower case with excellent airflow, tempered glass panels, and customizable RGB lighting.

computer_parts.name: Noctua NH-D15 CPU Cooler
computer_parts.description: A premium air cooler with dual fans, providing efficient and quiet cooling for high-performance processors.

computer_parts.name: Logitech MX Master 3S Mouse
computer_parts.description: An ergonomic and precision wireless mouse with customizable buttons, perfect for productivity and creative work.

computer_parts.name: LG UltraGear 34GP950G-B Monitor
computer_parts.description: A 34-inch ultra-wide QHD monitor with Nano IPS technology, 1ms response time, and G-SYNC compatibility for immersive gaming.
